# netET

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Miscellaneous functions of Network analysis and visulization, and Most of the functions are copied from linkET package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of netET from [GitHub](https://github.com/netET) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Hy4m/netET")
```
